comments.body:
Add a comment that the license file is manually packaged. I've opened a PR upstream to deal with this in future releases (https://github.com/amccaugh/phidl/pull/86). The comment is a visual reminder that once this is merge, or some other solution is used, the manually packaged copy should be removed:

```
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/amccaugh/phidl/pull/86
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/amccaugh/phidl/pull/86
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
